com.nokia.midp.examples.mms
Class MMSMIDlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
      com.nokia.midp.examples.mms.MMSMIDlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.wireless.messaging.MessageListener, java.lang.Runnable
public class MMSMIDlet
extends javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
implements javax.wireless.messaging.MessageListener, java.lang.Runnable

MMSMIDlet implements a messaging application that exchanges MMS messages using the API as defined in JSR-205.
